title.rendered: Best 7 WordPress creative themes for Businesses and Corporates

content.rendered:
Nowadays any kind of business, from the smallest to the biggest one, deserves a good website. In this article I collected a list of creative WordPress themes for business and corporates, I hope they can help you to find the most suitable theme for your WordPress website.

Mint – Creative Multi-Purpose WordPress Theme

Mint is a powerful Multi-Purpose WordPress theme, its creative design aims for business website, but its flexibility allows you to adapt it to almost any kind of website.
It indeed includes for free Visual Composer and Ultimate Addons for Visual Composer, two premium plugins that will allow you to design any kind of pages in just a matter of minutes, without touch the code. It also includes Revolution Slider for free and it is compatible with WooCommerce.

Bruno – Creative Multi Purpose WordPress Theme

Bruno is a quite recent theme that is quickly gaining the favor of the market, due to its good features and its nice design (and also its launching promo price).
It includes Visual Composer for free ($34 saved) and enhance it with 40+ custom elements.

Intact – Premium Multi-Purpose WordPress Theme

Intact is a very clean and modern theme. It includes many premium plugins:

  • Visual Composer (save $34)
  • Templatera for Visual Composer (save $12)
  • Revolution Slider (save $25)

In addition, it bundles the icon pack IconsMind (save $59), for a total of $130!

Native – Powerful Startup Development Tool

Native is a very good theme that has reached almost 2.000 sales in less than 5 months. The secret seems to be the high customization level. It has dozens and dozens of premade pages and different layouts (you can see them in the demo), which make it perfect for a broad target of business and corporates.

You can read more about themes for startup here.

Kleanity – Minimalist WordPress Theme / Creative Portfolio

Kleanity is a minimal and modern theme, it has been developed by GoodLayers, which is a very trusted author in the ThemeForest marketplace, with 4.5 stars on 9000+ reviews.
The theme is highly flexible and has a very high customization level. It is powered by the GoodLayers page builder, if you used some other of their theme, then you know it. In addition it has 19 header styles and many other features, such as the 1 click demo install.

Hook – Superior WordPress Theme

If you are looking for a one page company website, Hook is a very good choise. You can have a look at its 23 demos to understand that you can use it for basically every kind of business. If you choose it, you can count on many good features such as: a powerful page builder; footer builder; RTL support; one click demo installation; many icons pack bundled with the theme.

Argenta – Creative Multipurpose WordPress Theme

Argenta another clean and minimal corporate theme that can suit a wide range of customers. If you have a look at the demos, you will find any kind of business: corporate, gym, agency portfolio, personal portfolio, barber and much more.

Starry – Creative & Easy WordPress theme

Last but not least at all there is Starry. Starry is our Multipurpose theme design for those who are looking for a creative and elegant website. It allows you to create both a one page or a multi page website. It is powered by the Unyson and its page builder, so you can create any page with a simple Drag & Drop. Also if it isn’t really recent, we update it periodically, in order to keep it secure and useful. Most important, if you have already used some of our products, you know that we always take care of our customers with an outstanding support service.

Conclusion

I hope that you find this collection helpful.. If you think that I missed some good theme or if you want to share your experience with one of these themes, just let me know in the comments below.
